title.rendered: Samrat International School students receive value education

content.rendered:
The students of Samrat International School, Surat participated in an interactive session on value education workshop conducted by Smile Foundation under its Child for Child (CFC) Programme.

The teachers and children shared their experiences and suggestions while CFC representatives taught them the significance of values.

Smile Foundation visits various privileged schools across India and conducts engaging sessions for the young minds, under CFC programme. Children are sensitized in various causes, value systems and are ushered to realize their importance in growing up as responsible citizens of the country.
